class.name: AudioStreamPlaybackWithEffects
class.description: Playback instance created when [AudioStreamWithEffects] instantiates playback.

method.name: get_effect_instance
method.description: Returns the [AudioEffectInstance] created from the [AudioEffect] at the specified index on the instantiating [AudioStreamWithEffects] effect list. Negative values access indices from the end.

method.name: get_effect_instance_count
method.description: Returns the number of [AudioEffectInstance]s in this playback. Will return the same value as [member AudioStreamWithEffects.effect_count] on the instantiating [AudioStreamWithEffects] effects list.
